name: Jungle Dungeon (bliK)
description:
Deep in the heart of the dense jungle, there was said to be a treasure called "The Sun Orb" that radiated eternal light and makes - just like the sun, life possible. After a long journey, you finally reach your destination.

This is a sequel to my pervious game FOREST DUNGEON

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

[Left Mouse] is used for all interactions.

[WASD] for movement

[ESC] or [P] for menu

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

EXTRA:

Based on feedback I might continue with this small series, so feel free to post your thoughts about the game in the comments!

You can support future games on my patreon!
